page.title: 19A Typical Week-end
page.content: The way I usually spend a weekend is like this :- I wake up on Saturday morning at about half past nine,get dressed and have some breakfast. Then I put on my coat and walk over to my friend's house and together we go to the bus stop to catch the bus to Worcester. The journey takes about twenty minutes to get to Newport Street.We then walk through to the town and look into the shops.Sometimes we buy an article but usually we haven't got enough money.At 12'0'clock we buy some sandwiches, a bar of chocolate and a can of drink. We always have our dinner in Woolworths because that is the cheapest place to get a meal.When we've finished we carry on looking round the shops,at 1.45 pm we buy an ice lolly and walk down to the riverside to eat them.
